exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.BrSeatSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:chessCommonLib="chessCommonLib.*" minWidth="10" minHeight="10" width="90" height="90">
	<e:Image id="empty_bg" left="-12" right="-9" top="-10" bottom="-12" source="br_seatHead_png" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
	<chessCommonLib:Head id="head" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="lb_bg_img" source="name_bg_mask_png" left="0" right="0" y="60" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="nickName_lbl" text="1212" size="22" left="0" right="0" textAlign="center" multiline="false" height="22" bottom="8" visible="false"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="chips_lbl" text="" scaleX="0.85" scaleY="0.85" textAlign="center"  font="jinbi_num_fnt" width="104" y="91" horizontalCenter="-1" height="22" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.CommonPanelSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:chessCommonLib="chessCommonLib.*" width="808" height="554">
	<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Image source="zm_common_bg_png" scale9Grid="42,153,14,32" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="19" top="17" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Image source="zm_common_spot_png" y="25" fillMode="repeat" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="64" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="15" right="34"/>
		<e:Image id="_title" source="zm_userinfo_title_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="-15"/>
		<e:Button id="_closeBtn" label="" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" right="-10" top="-10">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="zm_common_close1_png" source.down="zm_common_close2_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameTaskButtonSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
<e:Image id="light_rotate" x="50" y="50" source="guang01_png" width="100" height="100" anchorOffsetX="50" anchorOffsetY="50" visible="false"/>
	<e:Button id="game_task" x="4" y="12">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="91" height="75" source="task_png" source.down="task_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="progress_text" text="(0/8)" y="82" x="22" size="24" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textAlign="center" textColor="0xaec6fe"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.HeadSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  minWidth="10" minHeight="10">
	<e:Image id="avar_img" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image id="avarFrame_img" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="2" source=""/>
	<e:Image id="gift_icon" source="head_gift_icon_png" y="-20" x="-20"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ShiShiCaiButtonSkin" width="100" height="110" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="_ratote" source="guang01_png" anchorOffsetX="50" anchorOffsetY="50" x="50" y="48" visible="false"/>
	<e:Button name="ssc" x="10">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ssc_btn1_png" source.down="ssc_btn2_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	
	<e:Label id="_timer" text="Label" y="82" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="18" textColor="0xdcffff" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="-1" textAlign="center" x="24"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.SysMsgMcSkin" width="561" height="39" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
    <e:Image  width="561" height="39"  source="mjl_lobby_systembg_png" />
	<!--<e:Label id="_msgTxt" size="24"  textColor="0xffffff"  fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" multiline="false" verticalAlign="middle" text=""/>-->
    <e:Image id="_vipIcon" source="vip_small1_png" scaleX="0.7" scaleY="0.7"/>
    <e:Image id="_worldchat" source="sys_msg_click_png" x="548"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.zm_ChatRadioButtonSkin" width="375" height="43" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="不好意思，我有事先走一步" x="5" size="22" width="365" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xfffefe" anchorOffsetX="0" rotation="359.99" anchorOffsetY="0" height="28" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.zm_ChatSkin" width="825" height="554" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:chessCommonLib="chessCommonLib.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Group width="825" height="554" x="0" y="0" touchEnabled="false">
        <e:Image source="zm_help_bg_png" x="37.33" y="103" anchorOffsetX="0" width="325" anchorOffsetY="0" height="326"
                 scale9Grid="15,14,19,23" locked="true" />
        <e:Image source="zm_help_bg_png" x="37.33" y="453.01" anchorOffsetX="0" width="551.67" anchorOffsetY="0"
                 height="59.33" scale9Grid="15,14,19,23" locked="true" />
        <e:Image source="zm_help_bg_png" x="383.17" y="103" anchorOffsetX="0" width="387" anchorOffsetY="0" height="326"
                 scale9Grid="15,14,19,23" locked="true" />
        <e:Image source="zm_horn_png" x="55" y="465.67" locked="true" />
        <e:Scroller id="faceScroller" width="313" height="313" x="45" y="112" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
            <e:Group id="faceGroup" anchorOffsetX="0" width="313" anchorOffsetY="0" height="313" >
							<e:layout>
								<e:TileLayout horizontalGap="2"/>
							</e:layout>
						</e:Group>
        </e:Scroller>
			<e:Scroller id="chatScroller" width="375" height="313" x="392.5" y="112" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
				<e:Group id="chatGroup" anchorOffsetX="0" width="375" anchorOffsetY="0" height="313">
					<e:layout>
						<e:TileLayout horizontalGap="0"/>
					</e:layout>
				</e:Group>
			</e:Scroller>
        <e:EditableText id="textField" width="479.26" height="50" x="101.08" y="459.01" size="28"
                        textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" prompt="请在此输入内容，总长度不超过60字！" promptColor="0x6a6fb7"
                        textColor="0xffffff" anchorOffsetX="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" strokeColor="0x332f2f" />
			<e:Button id="sendBtn" label="" x="603.08" y="453.01">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="zm_send1_png" source.down="zm_send2_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.zm_FaceButtonSkin" width="75" height="75" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"
             verticalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.zm_GiftItemSkin" width="110" height="167" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="zm_userinfo_bg1_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="_gift_img" source="zm_userinfo_gift1_png" x="16.5" y="61"/>
	<e:Label id="_gift_name" text="黄瓜" x="2.5" y="18" anchorOffsetX="0" width="105" textAlign="center" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="20"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.zm_HelpSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:chessCommonLib="chessCommonLib.*">
	<e:Group width="825" height="554" x="-1" y="1.52" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled="false">
		<e:Image source="zm_help_bg_png" y="143.74" anchorOffsetX="0" width="729.57" anchorOffsetY="0" height="370.49" scale9Grid="17,15,17,21" x="38"/>
		<e:Label id="_titleTxt" text="我是标题" y="167.79" textColor="0xe6c347" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" horizontalCenter="-9.5" textAlign="center"/>
		<e:Label id="_typeTxt" text="经典模式  底注:100  入场:2000  离场:1000" y="107.18" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textAlign="center" rotation="359.91" anchorOffsetX="0" width="724.96" textColor="0xffffff" size="24" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Scroller width="693" height="255" x="58.99" y="208.73" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
			<e:Group anchorOffsetX="0" width="688">
				<e:Label id="_contentTxt" text="暂无" x="29.85" y="21.15" anchorOffsetX="0" width="641" size="18"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Scroller>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.zm_SetPanelSKin" width="690" height="403" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:chessCommonLib="chessCommonLib.*">
	<w:Config id="163b4c70982"/>
	<e:Group id="_mainGroup" width="690" height="403" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled="false">
		<e:Label text="方言" x="509" y="270" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="25" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label text="音效" x="508" y="199" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="25" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="leftBtn" source="game_sp_arrow_left_png" x="28" y="197" touchEnabled="true" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="rightBtn" source="game_sp_arrow_right_png" x="453" y="197" touchEnabled="true" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:ToggleSwitch id="musicBtn" label="" x="581" y="116.5" enabled="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="50" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="game_sp_voice_on_png" source.down="game_sp_voice_off_png" source.disabled="game_sp_voice_off_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:ToggleSwitch>
		<e:ToggleSwitch id="soundBtn" label="" x="581" y="190" enabled="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="50" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="game_sp_voice_on_png" source.down="game_sp_voice_off_png" source.disabled="game_sp_voice_off_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:ToggleSwitch>
		<e:ToggleSwitch id="localSoundBtn" label="" x="581" y="262.5" enabled="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="50" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="game_sp_voice_on_png" source.down="game_sp_voice_off_png" source.disabled="game_sp_voice_off_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:ToggleSwitch>
		<e:Label text="音乐" x="507" y="128" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="25" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Group id="_imgGroup" width="367" height="201" x="70.5" y="116.5" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.zm_UserInfoSKin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:chessCommonLib="chessCommonLib.*">
	<e:Group width="825" height="554" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled="false">
		<e:Image source="zm_userinfo_bg2_png" x="200" y="143" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="zm_userinfo_bg2_png" x="425" y="143" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="zm_bean_png" x="433" y="146" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="zm_diamond_png" x="204" y="148" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="zm_userinfo_gps_png" x="41" y="272" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="zm_userinfo_head_png" x="32" y="89" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="zm_common_bg1_png" x="32" y="314" scale9Grid="20,21,7,8" anchorOffsetX="0" width="733" anchorOffsetY="0" height="189" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="_name_lbl" text="名字最多几个字" x="240" y="101" anchorOffsetX="0" width="577" textAlign="left" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="28" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="_id_lbl" text="帐号:44422200" x="204" y="201" anchorOffsetX="0" width="186" textAlign="left" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="24" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="_gps_lbl" text="" x="67" y="268.5" anchorOffsetX="0" textAlign="left" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="24" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="_bean_lbl" text="00000." x="484" y="152.5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="137" textAlign="left" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="26" textColor="0xfff285" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="_diamond_lbl" text="00000." x="259" y="153" anchorOffsetX="0" width="137" textAlign="left" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="26" textColor="0xFFF285" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="_ip_lbl" text="地址:192.168.000.000" x="395.5" y="201" anchorOffsetX="0" width="267" textAlign="left" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="24" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="_gender_img" width="24" height="24" x="204" y="105" source="zm_userinfo_male_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>		
		<e:Group id="_head" width="134" height="131" x="43" y="102" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Image id="_head_img" width="130" height="129" x="2" y="1" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

	<e:Image id="faceIcon" x="0" y="0" source=""/>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatFcaePanelSkin" width="920" height="320" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">



	<e:Image source="sz_common_chat_facebg" y="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>

	<e:Scroller id="scroll" width="892" height="308.66" x="13" y="7.67" scrollPolicyV="off" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Group y="-139.67" x="22" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
			 <e:List id="faceList" width="888.67" height="284.66" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatFcaeItemSkin"
                anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" y="10"  x="0">
            <e:ArrayCollection>
                <e:Array>
                    <e:Object/>

                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
					 <e:Object dsf="null" />

					   <e:Object dsf="null" />

            </e:ArrayCollection>
            <e:layout>
                <e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="9" horizontalGap="31" verticalGap="33" paddingLeft="20" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:List>

		 <e:List id="faceList1" width="888.67" height="284.66" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatFcaeItemSkin"
                anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" y="10"  x="900">
            <e:ArrayCollection>
                <e:Array>
                    <e:Object/>
                    <e:Object/>
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
					 <e:Object dsf="null" />

					   <e:Object dsf="null" />
                </e:Array>
            </e:ArrayCollection>
            <e:layout>
                <e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="9" horizontalGap="31" verticalGap="33" paddingLeft="20" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:List>
		
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
			<e:Image id="page1Point1" source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_point1" y="304" horizontalCenter="-54.5"/>
        	<e:Image id="page1Point2" source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_point2" y="304" horizontalCenter="-54.5"/>
			<e:Image id="page2Point1" source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_point1" y="304" horizontalCenter="-4.5"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatListItemSkin"  xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="960">
	<e:Label id="chat_lb" size="27" maxChars="60" text=""  lineSpacing="5" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" left="8" top="3" fontFamily="null1" multiline="true" width="949" bottom="6" textColor="0x239924" visible="false"/>
		<e:Label id="name_lb" size="27"  x="106" y="7" width="198" height="26" fontFamily="null1" textColor="0x000000" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="vipIcon" source="mid_vip12" x="5.5" y="0" visible="false"/>
	<!--<e:Image id="chat_line" source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_line" x="5" bottom="0" visible="false"/>-->
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatPanelSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="loadingTip">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{loading_img}">
				<tween:To duration="3000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{360}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Image source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_bg" y="78.33" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true" />
	<e:Image id="loading_img" anchorOffsetX="58" anchorOffsetY="58" y="316" source="Emojchat_loading_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
	<e:Button id="chatSend" label="" x="1042.83" y="587" anchorOffsetX="66.33" anchorOffsetY="35.67" width="130">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image source="sz_common_chat_sendBtn1" source.down="sz_common_chat_sendBtn1" scaleX.down="1.05"
				         scaleY.down="1.05" />
				<e:Image id="sendDisable" source="sz_common_chat_sendBtn2" source.down="sz_common_chat_sendBtn2" visible="false" />
				<e:Image id="send_word" source="sz_common_chat_send" source.down="sz_common_chat_send" horizontalCenter="0"
				         verticalCenter="0.5" scaleX.down="1.1" scaleY.down="1.1" anchorOffsetX="54.67" anchorOffsetY="20" visible="true" />
				<e:Image id="send_wordDisable" source="sz_common_chat_send2" source.down="sz_common_chat_send2" horizontalCenter="0"
				         verticalCenter="0.5" scaleX.down="1.1" scaleY.down="1.1" anchorOffsetX="54.67" anchorOffsetY="20" />
				<e:Label size="33" fontFamily="null1" id="sendClock" text="" x="11.33" y="8" verticalAlign="middle"
				         textAlign="center" anchorOffsetX="0" width="110.34" anchorOffsetY="0" height="53" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="chatClose" label="" x="1120.5" y="53.83" anchorOffsetX="29" anchorOffsetY="25">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image source="sz_Lobby_help_close" source.down="sz_Lobby_help_close" scaleX.down="1.1" scaleY.down="1.1" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Scroller id="chatScroll" width="963" height="420.33" x="159" y="109" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"
	            bounces="false" scrollPolicyH="off">
		<e:List id="chatList" height="453.66" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatListItemSkin"
		        anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" y="-30.67" x="0">
			<e:ArrayCollection>
				<e:Array>
					<e:Object x="1" y="2" />
					<e:Object/>
					<e:Object dsf="null" />
					<e:Object dsf="null" />
					<e:Object dsf="null" />

	<e:Image left="90" bottom="12" top="37" right="2" width="306" anchorOffsetX="0" source="chat_chat_bg_png" height="30" anchorOffsetY="0" scale9Grid="24,23,84,32"/>
	<e:Label id="chat_txt" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" right="4" left="109" top="43" bottom="22" size="23" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="6" text="{data.data.words}"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.ChatListSkin1" width="415" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="396" height="60" x="9" y="653" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image source="chat_input_bg_png" scale9Grid="8,7,49,46" right="0" left="0" bottom="0" top="0" locked="true" />
		<e:Button id="roomType_btn" label="" x="5.5" verticalCenter="0.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_room_btn_normal_png" source.down="chat_room_btn_normal_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="labaType_btn" label="" x="5.5" verticalCenter="0.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_laba_btn_normal_png" source.down="chat_laba_btn_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image source="chat_input_png" anchorOffsetX="0" scale9Grid="6,5,38,34" verticalCenter="0" height="44" left="92"
		         right="76" />
		<e:Button id="send_bt" label="" verticalCenter="0.5" x="323">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_send_normal_png" source.down="chat_send_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:EditableText id="chat_etxt" height="31" text="" y="14" anchorOffsetX="0" left="99" right="83"
		                fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0x14142a" size="24" verticalAlign="middle" prompt="请输入聊天内容" />
		<!--<e:Button id="voice_btn" label="" x="282" y="14" visible="false">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_voice_normal_png" source.down="chat_voice_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>-->
	</e:Group>
	<e:Scroller id="chat_scr" left="15" right="15" top="20" bottom="82">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="chat_lst" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.ChatListItemSkin1" right="0" left="0">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top" gap="10" />
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Group id="chat_select_grp" x="15" y="590">
		<e:Button id="labaDrop_btn" label="">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_laba_drop_normal_png" source.down="chat_laba_drop_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="roomDrop_btn" label="">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_room_drop_normal_png" source.down="chat_room_drop_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.ChatUserSkin1" width="458" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image x="0" scale9Grid="12,11,66,72" width="420" top="0" bottom="0" source="chat_noset_bg_png"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="chat_btn" label="" y="222" left="406">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_chat_normal_png" source.down="chat_chat_selected_png" source.disabled="chat_chat_selected_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="noseat_btn" label="" y="348" left="409">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_noset_normal_png" source.down="chat_noset_selected_png" source.disabled="chat_noset_selected_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="mess_count"  height="20" y="427" font="room_num_fnt" text="0" x="420" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.UserListItemSkin1" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="93">
	<e:Image source="chat_userlist_bg_png" scale9Grid="17,13,45,46" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="avar_img" width="55" height="55" x="14" y="17" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="{data.headUrl}"/>
	<e:Image id="vip_img" y="-1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="118" anchorOffsetY="0" height="97" source="{data.vipLevel}" x="-18"/>

	<e:Image id="frame_img" width="60" height="60" x="11.5" y="14" source="chat_input_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" locked="true" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="name_lb" y="10.5" textColor="0xabc2ff" horizontalCenter="37" text="{data.nickName}"/>
	<e:Label id="gold_lb" text="{data.remainder}" y="49" size="26" textColor="0xfdf4a9" horizontalCenter="37"/>
	<e:Image source="chat_coin_png" x="91" y="41" anchorOffsetX="0" width="45" anchorOffsetY="0" height="45"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.UserListSkin1" width="400" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="loadingTip">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{loading_img}">
				<tween:To duration="3000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{360}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Scroller width="363" height="680" x="19" y="20">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="noseat_lst" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" right="0" left="0" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.UserListItemSkin1">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top" paddingTop="0"/>
				</e:layout>
				<e:ArrayCollection>
					<e:Array>
						<e:Object id="null" headUrl="null" nickName="null" remainder="null"/>
					</e:Array>
				</e:ArrayCollection>
			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image id="loading_img" source="chat_loading_png" anchorOffsetX="18" anchorOffsetY="18" x="202" y="361"/>
</e:Skin>
